scripts.build-w32: electron-packager . "Wemo UI" --overwrite --asar --platform=win32  --arch=ia32 --prune=true --out=builds --app-copyright"Copyright © 2018 Evan Young" --icon="assets/icons/win/icon.ico"  --win32metadata.CompanyName="Evan Young" --win32metadata.FileDescription="Wemo desktop application." --win32metadata.ProductName="WemoUI"
scripts.build-w64: electron-packager . "Wemo UI" --overwrite --asar --platform=win32  --arch=x64  --prune=true --out=builds --app-copyright"Copyright © 2018 Evan Young" --icon="assets/icons/win/icon.ico"  --win32metadata.CompanyName="Evan Young" --win32metadata.FileDescription="Wemo desktop application." --win32metadata.ProductName="WemoUI"
scripts.build-win: npm run build-w32 && npm run build-w64
